nodes.text: Kariya was a female Twi'lek Pilgrim who lived on Tython during the Cold War between the Sith Empire and the Galactic Republic.

A Twi'lek female, Kariya was one of many Pilgrims who followed Matriarch Kolovish to the planet Tython in the aftermath of the Great Galactic War. Assisting in the establishment of Kalikori village, she lived during the Cold War when the village was invaded by Flesh Raiders.
